answerText: Puget Sound [10] This body of water in Southern Alaska was the site of the 1989 Exxon Valdez oil spill.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | UC San Diego and Washington University and Chicago B | 15 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Identify the following related bodies of water,  [10] Connected to the Pacific Ocean by the Juan de Fuca Strait, is one of the prominent geographic features of the state of Washington. On its shores lie the cities of Olympia, Tacoma, and Seattle.
